About Canada

Studying, travelling, working and immigrating to Canada can be a rewarding, life changing experience. The vast landscape of Canada offers diverse eco-systems and cultural communities. It contains charming small towns and vibrant big cities. It is one of the most welcoming, multi-cultural countries in the world with affordable health care and standard of living. According to Business Insider, Canada is rated in the top ten of desirable places to live.

Read more
Services

Get to know our services and how we can help you with your plans to come to Canada.

Study Permit

A study permit is a document that is issued to a foreign national which allows the individual to study at an approved designated learning institution in Canada.

Learn more
Temporary Resident

Some foreign nationals need Canadian visas to travel to Canada while citizens of some other countries are exempt from having a visa.

Learn more
Work Permit

Getting a Canadian work permit is mandatory in order to engage in any form of paid work. Currently, there are four types of work permits.

Learn more
Express Entry

This is a process of obtaining permanent residency in Canada. Under this process there are three different ways you can apply.

Learn more

About Us

Goshen Immigration Consulting is an immigration company based in Ontario, Canada. Our mission is to ensure that our clients’ goals are not only met but are exceeded through guidance and professional advice throughout the application process. Charles is a graduate from Niagara College and has worked for many years as an International Student Advisor. He is professionally trained as a Regulated Immigration Consultant and is also a registered Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant.

Goshen Immigration Consultant
